title: BRIEF-West Fraser To Reduce British Columbia Lumber And Plywood Operating Schedules And Production
text:
BRIEF-West Fraser To Reduce British Columbia Lumber And Plywood Operating Schedules And Production

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 09, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-West Fraser To Reduce British Columbia Lumber And Plywood Operating Schedules And Production West Fraser Timber Co Ltd : * WEST FRASER TO REDUCE BRITISH COLUMBIA LUMBER AND PLYWOOD OPERATING SCHEDULES AND PRODUCTION * WEST FRASER TIMBER CO LTD - ACTIONS WILL RESULT IN AN ESTIMATED DECREASE OF PRODUCTION IN RANGE OF 15-25% OF CURRENT B.C. LUMBER PRODUCTION * WEST FRASER TIMBER CO LTD - WOULD CURTAIL B.C. PLYWOOD PRODUCTION FOR 2 WEEKS REDUCING OUTPUT BY ABOUT 9 MSF * WEST FRASER TIMBER CO LTD - CURTAILMENT OF PLYWOOD OPERATIONS IN B.C. ARE EXPECTED TO COMMENCE SEPTEMBER 16, 2019 * WEST FRASER TIMBER - POTENTIAL EFFECT OF REVISED OPERATING SCHEDULES COULD BE REDUCTION BY UP TO ABOUT 100 MILLION BOARD FEET THROUGH TO END OF YEAR * WEST FRASER TIMBER - PRODUCTION REDUCTIONS AND CURTAILMENTS ARE A RESULT OF SUSTAINED WEAK MARKETS, PRICING IN WOOD PRODUCT MARKETS AND HIGH LOG COSTS

BRIEF-West Fraser To Reduce British Columbia Lumber And Plywood Operating Schedules And Production
